description:
Luffy and the gang come face to face with Robin and her CP9 comrades. The rubberman is prepared to fight for his friend, but he`s never faced foes like this!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come Back, Robin! Showdown with CP9!
Kaette Koi Robin! CP9 to no Taiketsu!
Reviens, Robin ! L’affrontement avec le CP9 !
عودي يا روبين! القتال مع سي بي 9!
帰って来いロビン! CP9との対決!
